full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Reference Number**: PW-23-01026839
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-231249/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-03T14:00:00

### Item Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supply of Hose Assemblies, Nonmetallic.

**Item Details**

* **GSIN**: 4720 (Hose and Flexible Tubing)
* **NSN**: N/A
* **Description**: NONMETALLIC HOSE ASSEMBLY

**Delivery Locations**

* CFB Esquimalt (12 Units)
* CFB Halifax (12 Units)

**Submission Requirements**

Bidders proposing a product equivalent or replacement must indicate the brand name, model number, or NCAGE. Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Procurement Method

This procurement will follow the competitive procurement method, with open bidding.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Jean-Pierre Normandin
* **Email**: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* **Telephone**: 819-939-3674

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be accessed at the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/21/ad5150bb5be5d13ef73d34fb38fd2900/rfp_w8482-231249-a-en.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/21/45374386de190feebae9ce3fb17ed937/rfp_w8482-231249-a-fr.pdf (French). written contract detail wherever there is **_ITEM DETAILS_**,.



### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* **Regions of Opportunity**: Not Specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia and British Columbia
